content.rendered:
Uses

Design specifically suitable for ED users

Marketing Target

  • Customers over 40 y/o
  • People extensively using ED

Advantages

  • Multi-purpose lens with boosted intermediate vision
  • Intermediate area increased up to 30%.
  • Keep unwanted astigmatism within the patiens’ addition limit

excerpt.rendered: The lens conceived for those wearers looking for a solution tailor-made on their needs.
